mapper.select: SELECT CONF_VALUE FROM DLOAN_CONF_TBL WHERE CONF_ID = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL WHERE REQ_STATUS = 'S05' AND LOAN_WAIT_DATE < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.001, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT REC_KEY AS REQ_KEY , (SELECT REC_KEY FROM CO_LOAN_USER_TBL CLUT WHERE CLUT.USER_NO=DRT.USER_NO AND ROWNUM=1) AS USER_KEY FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL DRT WHERE REQ_STATUS = 'S05' AND LOAN_WAIT_DATE < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.001, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT REC_KEY AS REQ_KEY , (SELECT REC_KEY FROM CO_LOAN_USER_TBL CLUT WHERE CLUT.USER_NO=DRT.USER_NO AND ROWNUM=1) AS USER_KEY , LOAN_KEY AS LOAN_KEY , BOOK_KEY AS BOOK_KEY , (SELECT SPECIES_KEY FROM BO_PURCHASEINFO_TBL BPT WHERE BPT.REC_KEY=DRT.PURCHASE_KEY) AS SPECIES_KEY , PURCHASE_KEY AS PURCHASE_KEY FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL DRT WHERE REQ_STATUS = 'S07' AND LOAN_WAIT_DATE < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+0.001, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DLOAN_REQ_STATUS_HIS_TBL ( REQ_KEY, REQ_STATUS, CHANGE_USER_TYPE, CHANGE_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE ) SELECT REC_KEY , 'S08' , 'T' , 'Task Scheduler' , SYSDATE FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL WHERE REC_KEY = #{reqKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE DLOAN_REQ_TBL SET REQ_STATUS = 'S08' WHERE REC_KEY = #{reqKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DLOAN_REQ_USER_LIMIT_TBL (REC_KEY , REQ_KEY , USER_KEY , INPUT_DATE) VALUES( DLOAN_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{reqKey} , #{userKey} , sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE DLOAN_REQ_TBL SET REQ_STATUS='S09' WHERE REC_KEY=#{reqKey}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL DRT WHERE MOD((FLOOR( TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) )-#{smsDate} ),#{smsPeriod}) = 0 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE -#{smsDate}) AND TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE +#{maxSendDate}-#{smsDate}-1) AND REQ_STATUS = 'S06' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM MN_SMS_LOG_TBL WHERE USER_KEY=DRT.USER_NO AND SMS_TYPE='DLN09' AND SEND_TIME BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)+0.99999 )

SELECT NAME AS USER_NAME, SMS_YN AS SMS_YN, RETURN_PLAN_DATE AS RETURN_PLAN_DATE, TITLE AS TITLE, HANDPHONE AS HANDPHONE, LIB_MANAGE_CODE AS LIB_MANAGE_CODE, USER_NO AS USER_NO, (SELECT STORE_PHONE FROM DLOAN_STORE_TBL WHERE STORE_ID = DRT.STORE_ID) AS STORE_PHONE, (SELECT STORE_NAME FROM DLOAN_STORE_TBL WHERE STORE_ID = DRT.STORE_ID) AS STORE_NAME FROM DLOAN_REQ_TBL DRT WHERE MOD((FLOOR( TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) )-#{smsDate} ),#{smsPeriod}) = 0 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE -#{smsDate}) AND TRUNC(RETURN_PLAN_DATE +#{maxSendDate}-#{smsDate}-1) AND REQ_STATUS = 'S06' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM MN_SMS_LOG_TBL WHERE USER_KEY=DRT.USER_NO AND SMS_TYPE='DLN09' AND SEND_TIME BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)+0.99999 )
